12.content:
You wake up with a really painful headache, without any memory of what happened before you passed out, with some effort you stand up, just to notice that you were shrunk, at least you had your clothes on.

With some difficult, you try to remember something about how you ended like that, but then a shadow loomed above you, it was a giant foot, you got scared and ran away from it before it crushed you. Then you saw that even more foots were coming down, you're totally confused. What was going on? Where you were exactly? Somebody did this to you?

You finally get to a safe spot under what seemed to be a chair. You take a time to get recovered from the shock, and when you do it,you see that you were in what initially seemed to be a mall, but after looking some people with luggage and some other with pilot uniforms, you realize that you were in an airport.

It didn't seemed like the airport that was in the city where you were living. This one was different, somehow.

Anyway, welcome to your new life, enjoy it as you can and a tip to not get bored: be creative. Said that, goodbye and i hope you don't complain about anything, seriously, my boss would kill me."

It was signed with a strange symbol. When you finished your reading, the letter disappeared in your hands.

You couldn't believe what you just read, somebody took you out from your home, made you smaller and some other things without your permission and locked you in a kind of pocket reality where the only thing you could do is have fun with an endless variety of giantesses.
